title: First Tuesday: four hours in My Lai [anatomy of a massacre]
creator_credit: Yorkshire Television, Kevin Sim and Michael Bilton
brief_description: Tells the story of the massacre of villagers (mostly women and children), by U.S. troops at the Vietnamese village of My Lai on March 16, 1968. Survivors, both villagers and soldiers, speak of their experiences, memories and how they have coped since.
